name: Hero Swap Dungeoneering
description:
This game was what I submitted for my Capstone project in my final year of my degree! Cut it close and some aesthetic features were cut, but I am very proud of the technical complexity of this one.

You play as a party of three fantasy adventurers whose capabilities are based on their randomly generated weapons - but instead of three separate people, these three party members occupy the same body, but with their own health and stamina! Switch when the time is right and time your attacks and dodges to defeat the enemies and the boss!
